document.full_text: while mark rylance received almost across-the-board praise for his portrayal of johnny byron, many readers said the script failed to match its star's wattage.
document.title: curtain down, heads up: readers review 'jerusalem'
lines_and_colors: while mark rylance received almost across-the-board praise for his portrayal of johnny byron, many readers said the script failed to match its star's wattage.
